name: Spirit of the Forest (dwaller2018)
description: You and your friend - the inexplicably immortal turtle - are the only creatures in the forest not affected by Zephyr's curse! Traverse through 3 unique platforming levels that you create with Sage's amazing plant growing powers! Will you launch yourself into the air with a mushroom? Gain height with a tree? Or avoid touching the ground with a flower? The choice is your's! Stay out of danger and save the forest.
